author: dinyar
body:
#### PR description:

Recently it was noticed that the uGT data-emulator mismatch ratio plot could show more than 100% mismatches. The cause for this is that while the denominator is filled once per event, the numerator is filled for each mismatching algorithm bit.

This PR changes the logic such that the numerator is filled only once per event. Arguably it would be nicer to instead fill the denominator with all valid algo bits, however to my knowledge it's not trivial to retrieve the number of algorithms used by a given menu from the DQM.

#### PR validation:

None yet.
title: Fix ratio plot for uGT data-emulator mismatches
